name: Flappy Doom
description:
(for best performance, use a browser OTHER THAN Mozilla Firefox)

My mash-up of Flappy Bird and the original DooM. Made over a weekend in 2020.

Your mission: send the demons back to hell, for as long as you can.

Use the SPACEBAR to flap.
Once you have ammo, AIM with the MOUSE. Press LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to shoot.

Enjoy...! My personal top score is just a bit under 1300. Have you beaten that? If so, please post a screenshot and comment.

"THANK YOU FOR PLAY!" [sic]
